  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">cllr Andy Lloyd Retweeted Dartford Labour</p>

  </div>

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0"><a href="https://t.co/Bjca3Kuq9f" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/magazine/6729683.stm" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/magazine/6729683.stm"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/magazine/</span><span class="invisible">6729683.stm</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a>
I'm not so happy with the price rise either. However rail nationalisation is not the answer. I started work commuting at the end of the 70's when socialists last in power. The train carriages were 1950's and staff on strike for weeks on end.</p>
</div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Reply</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero ">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
      </span>
  </button>
</div>

        <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="923181229771333632" id="stream-item-tweet-923181229771333632" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;923181229771333632&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

</small>

          <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--more js-more-ProfileTweet-actions">
    <div class="dropdown">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">
      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">
        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">cllr Andy Lloyd Retweeted (((Dan Hodges)))</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">And the priority of getting to the truth quickly is to enable action to avoid another disaster.<a href="https://t.co/NHWjwSzyre" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/DPJHodges/status/882313040212963328" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/DPJHodges/status/882313040212963328"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/DPJHodges/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/882313040212963328</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">cllr Andy Lloyd added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/DPJHodges/status/882313040212963328" data-conversation-id="882313040212963328" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="882313040212963328" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="DPJHodges" data-user-id="62123765" href="/DPJHodges/status/882313040212963328" data-conversation-id="882313040212963328" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">(((Dan Hodges)))</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>DPJHodges</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">The job of the Grenfell inquiry is not, as Jeremy Corbyn said, "to earn the trust of the community". It's to uncover the truth.</div>

  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>

  <ul>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button>

        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>

  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>

  <ul>

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Dept for Transport</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>transportgovuk</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Better road journeys for drivers and passengers with new <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>LowerThamesCrossing</b></span> route <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bit.ly/2orOW29" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://bit.ly/2orOW29"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bit.ly/2orOW29</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/NKQQmfNXwJ</span></div>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/cllrAndyLloyd" data-user-id="620211113">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000055456356/d7e38394ee89e109f7b3a69ef620e626_bigger.png" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate ">cllr Andy Lloyd</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>cllrAndyLloyd</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">cllr Andy Lloyd Retweeted Kent Police Dartford</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Well done. When will they learn. We do not tollorate these bikes on the Heath. Dangerous to law abiding users.<a href="https://t.co/MnUwR90bCq" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/kentpolicedart/status/822724894630748160" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/kentpolicedart/status/822724894630748160"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/kentpolicedart</span><span class="invisible">/status/822724894630748160</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">cllr Andy Lloyd added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">cllr Andy Lloyd Retweeted </p>

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">We Love Dartford</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>welovedartford</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Everything's going swimmingly at the new <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="4350168683"><s>@</s><b>fairfield_lc</b></span>, they had over 8,000 swims just in the first fortnight! <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/cxoKzc0gYn</span></div>
        </div>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="665636532548730880" data-item-id="665636532548730880" data-permalink-path="/jamie_woods/status/665636532548730880" data-conversation-id="665636532548730880" data-tweet-nonce="665636532548730880-bc0fcd1f-8065-471c-880e-967f9f5e8344" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="666162557938479104" data-retweeter="cllrAndyLloyd" data-screen-name="jamie_woods" data-name="jamie woods" data-user-id="22375405" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="cllrAndyLloyd" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;22375405&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;jamie_woods&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;jamie woods&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;jamie woods&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;jamie woods&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;620211113&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;cllrAndyLloyd&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;cllr Andy Lloyd&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;cllr Andy Lloyd&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;cllr Andy Lloyd&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">

  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>

  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">cllr Andy Lloyd Retweeted DartfordConservative</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Very positive reception I must add.<a href="https://t.co/n81BTkhzs1" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Dartford_CA/status/645183237006979073" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Dartford_CA/status/645183237006979073"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Dartford_CA/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/645183237006979073</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0"><a href="http://t.co/yk3TLsS2Gr" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.dartford.gov.uk/news/News-Archive/using-new-powers-to-keep-dartford-heath-safe" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.dartford.gov.uk/news/News-Archive/using-new-powers-to-keep-dartford-heath-safe"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">dartford.gov.uk/news/News-Arch</span><span class="invisible">ive/using-new-powers-to-keep-dartford-heath-safe</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a>
Clear message. Anti Social behaviour is not welcome on Dartford Heath. Get a room!</p>
</div>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Never seen anti Labour. And they call us the nasty party.     <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="593166651807428608" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="Dartford_CA" data-user-id="2181147976" href="/Dartford_CA/status/593166651807428608" data-conversation-id="593166651807428608" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">
      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The Orchard Theatre Dartford is fantastic. Air-coolling will make it brilliant.

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

      <div class="stream-item-header">

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>

      </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">2,500 <a href="/hashtag/kentstreetlights?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>kentstreetlights</b></a> will be switched off on a trial basis for a year. Check online before reporting a fault. <a href="http://t.co/Iy2VM3RksM" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bit.ly/11H0v3k" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://bit.ly/11H0v3k"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bit.ly/11H0v3k</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a>.</p>

    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

</div>


    

    

  </div>

  </span>

  </span>

    <script nonce="" id="track-ttft-body-script">
  if(window.ttft){
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('client_record_time', window.ttft.now());
  }
</script>
